quotes.quote: I believe in the forgiveness of sin and the redemption of ignorance.
quotes.author: Adlai E. Stevenson Jr.

quotes.quote: A person is never happy except at the price of some ignorance.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: Ignorance never settles a question.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: To be conscious that you are ignorant is a great step to knowledge.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Consistency requires you to be as ignorant today as you were a year ago.
quotes.author: Bernard Berenson

quotes.quote: A little learning is a dangerous thing but a lot of ignorance is just as bad.
quotes.author: Bob Edwards

quotes.quote: Ignorance is the night of the mind, but a night without moon and star.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Stupid is forever, ignorance can be fixed.
quotes.author: Don Wood

quotes.quote: It is no good to try to stop knowledge from going forward. Ignorance is never better than knowledge.
quotes.author: Enrico Fermi

quotes.quote: I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn't learn something from him.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: Ignorance gives one a large range of probabilities.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: It is better to confess ignorance than provide it.
quotes.author: Homer Hickam

quotes.quote: Ignorance of certain subjects is a great part of wisdom.
quotes.author: Hugo De Groot

quotes.quote: If knowledge can create problems, it is not through ignorance that we can solve them.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: My whole career can be summed up with 'Ignorance is bliss.' When you do not know better, you do not really worry about failing.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: It is impossible to make people understand their ignorance; for it requires knowledge to perceive it and therefore he that can perceive it hath it not.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: Nothing is worse than active ignorance.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Ignorance and inconsideration are the two great causes of the ruin of mankind.
quotes.author: John Tillotson

quotes.quote: Against logic there is no armor like ignorance.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence; then success is sure.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Nothing in all the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: We allow our ignorance to prevail upon us and make us think we can survive alone, alone in patches, alone in groups, alone in races, even alone in genders.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: It's innocence when it charms us, ignorance when it doesn't.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Ignorance, the root and the stem of every evil.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Better be ignorant of a matter than half know it.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: There are many things of which a wise man might wish to be ignorant.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Ignorance is not innocence but sin.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: Nothing is so good for an ignorant man as silence; and if he was sensible of this he would not be ignorant.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: It is worse still to be ignorant of your ignorance.
quotes.author: Saint Jerome

quotes.quote: The greater the ignorance the greater the dogmatism.
quotes.author: Sir William Osler
